text: α mount system or Alpha mount system may refer to: *Minolta A-mount system, an AF SLR system introduced by Minolta in 1985 *Konica Minolta A-mount system, an AF DSLR system by Konica Minolta between 2004 and 2006 *Sony α system, a camera system containing A-mount and E-mount digital cameras by Sony since 2006 == See also == *Sony A-mount system, a digital camera system by Sony since 2006 *Sony E-mount system, a digital camera system by Sony since 2010
title: Α mount system
